educations.inst: St. Joseph's College of Engineering, Chennai

experince.experience:
• • Ensured day to day performance of the client’s back-end database and made changes through complex SQL queries.
  • • Reworked on several stored procedures that resulted in a reduction of total run-time ranging from 10% to 50%.
  • • Implemented the ‘One-Click Report’ feature that expedited the tenure report generation process by 90%.

• • Oversaw a global banker’s clusters with numerous services such as MapReduce, HDFS, Yarn, and Sqoop.
  • • Analyzed cluster performance based on Disk Usage and CPU Usage using AppDynamics and Ambari.
  • • Monitored Control Nodes, Data Nodes & Edge Nodes using Unix Command Line (Shell scripting) and Ambari UI provided by Horton Works and brainstorm any issue with the team to come up with a permanent fix.

• • Worked on recommendation engine for multi-national office supply retail corporation’s e-commerce website.
  • • Formulated end-end descriptive analysis with cross-functional partners by understanding their business needs.
  • • Automated 6 Excel reports using macros and Teradata resulting in a reduction of 75% report generation time.

• • Developed a model to forecast hourly customer usage using ARIMA Time-Series analysis across multiple zones and Utilities.
  • • Saved around $4000 by developing web browser and SQL Server file upload automation prototype using Python-Selenium.
  • • Managed ‘DataMart’ of customer listings of various utilities across North-Eastern states.
  • • Spearheaded data migration from MS Access & MS Excel to SQL Server that reduce report generation time by 20%.

projects.shortInfo: Sense sentiment behind the user’s product reviews and help clients boost their performance and help retain customers. Performed web scrapping of the customer data and provided descriptive visualization using Shiny dashboards at scale. Predicted customer’s sentiment based on ratings/reviews using scikit-learn’s feature extraction, SVM and MNB algorithms. Determined issues that led to such ratings/reviews through topic modelling using LDA algorithm.

projects.projectTitle: Cluster Analysis and Decision Tree Induction
projects.shortInfo: Using Cluster Analysis and Decision Tree algorithm to solve a mystery in history: who wrote the disputed essays, Hamilton or Madison?

projects.projectTitle: Trend Analysis of Stock Price and Financial News
projects.shortInfo: Predicted the magnitude of stock prices fluctuation based on analysis of financial news through ML pipelines. Scrapped financial news from multiple news websites like Yahoo Finance and NASDAQ from the URLs obtained from an API. Performed regression analysis to obtain a quantifiable relationship between the sentiment score and stock price for the next day.

Complete Shiny App that predicts the medical condition based on the users’ symptoms using Naïve-Bayes, k-means & SVM. Recommend drugs for the patients’ medical conditions and the users’ review on the drugs’ effectiveness. Performed various clustering on the dataset to showcase similar medical conditions based on the hypothesis & symptoms.
Created a publication database that would assist in various data transactions of the publication company such as user subscription, customer details, advertiser details, expenditure & revenue.
Assignments and final project for the course Introduction to Data Science.
The goal is to recognize digits 0 to 9 in handwriting images.

projects.projectTitle: Association Rule Mining using Shiny App
projects.shortInfo: Analyze the AdultUCI dataset using arules package and present the findings through a Shiny App. In this report we will be performing Association Rules Mining (ARM) on one of the in-built datasets in R called the 'AdultUCI' to predict the income range and the corresponding factors causing the outcome. We will also be experimenting with the algorithm by changing the parameters through a Shiny App, the link to which is provided at the end of this report. (Or feel free to and have fun with the app!).

Telecommunications companies providing cell phone services are interested in customer retention. In particular, identifying customers who are about to churn(cancel their service) is potentially worth millions of dollars if the company can proactively address the reason that customer is considering cancellation and retain the customer.

projects.projectTitle: Regression and Artificial Neural Network Deep Learning
projects.shortInfo: Classify students based on their score.

summary:
Hello, I'm a Data Science enthusiast and M.Sc Applied Data Science graduate having 4 years of experience in the field of Database Management, Analysis & Machine Learning.

I'm passionate about programming and delivering, clean actionable insights. I seek to learn and try to apply all of it in a way that makes life easier. I always try to design, develop and deliver technology solutions to problems around me.
qoutes: Character consists of what you do on the third and fourth tries..
Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
It always seems impossible until it’s done.
It always seems impossible until it’s done.
There is no failure except in no longer trying.
You just can’t beat the person who won’t give up.
Never give up on something that you can’t go a day without thinking about.
Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
You do what you can for as long as you can, and when you finally can’t, you do the next best thing. You back up but you don’t give up.
Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop
If you fall behind, run faster. Never give up, never surrender, and rise up against the odds.
Survival can be summed up in three words―never give up. That’s the heart of it really. Just keep trying.
Successful men and women keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don’t quit.
helloText:
Dear Visitor, Thank you for visiting my webspace.

I’m a graduate student at Syracuse University's School of Information Studies majoring in Applied Data Science and I'm in pursuit of a full-time opportunity in the field of Data Analytics. I completed B.E. Electrical & Electronics Enginnering at Anna University.

I have strong hold on Structured Query Language, Python programming, R statistical programming and Visualization techiniques such as Tableau, R-Shiny & Power BI.

I do Data Analysis (Retrospective & Prespective) & Machine Learning. My drug of choice is SQL, Python and R :)

How can I help you?
I can design, develop and deliver analytical solutions to your business problems.

Do we have something in common? If yes, let's have a talk about it and grow together.

We don't have anything in common?
That's fine, please introduce me something that I'm missing.
